name: One Big Fluffle
description:
Join the bunnies in their war against the potentially evil corporation BEEPS.

Some of the text is broken if you're playing on windowed mode, so in that case just hit full screen and it should be perfectly readable.

Use SPACE to thump.

Use mouse wheel to zoom in and out, drag-click with left or right mouse to move around, and click with the  left mouse button to place the carrot.

Use ENTER to pause/continue

Use R to restart on the pause screens.
